itemEffect.name: Glow effect
itemEffect.description:
§bNone: §rRemoves all visual effects from enchanted items
§bDefault: §rThe default vanilla glint
§bGlow: §rAdds an additional glow effect around the item

enableCustomItemGlintColor.name: Custom glint color
enableCustomItemGlintColor.description: If you want to enable the custom glint color for enchanted items

customItemGlintColor.name: Glint color
customItemGlintColor.description: Choose the custom glint color for enchanted items

enableCustomArmorGlintColor.name: Custom glint color
enableCustomArmorGlintColor.description: If you want to enable the custom glint color for enchanted armor

customArmorGlintColor.name: Glint color
customArmorGlintColor.description: Choose the custom glint color for enchanted armor
